title: Luciano Pavarotti 2-CDs (Big Papi) Opera
description:
Source: CD's + Fresh Cover Art Scan

This is early works. One CD was restored in the 90's which falls way short of 21st century restorations. Second CD is not restored at all and it is very obvious as one can hear adjusting of chairs and people noises. Take it for what it is, a historical glimpse of a genius at work.

Please seed or this will die off quickly.

Also, the NFO generator always chokes on letters with accents so tracklist below is not quite right but the MP3 tags are perfect.

- Big Papi
